content: साक्षात् {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} {@--1@} In the presence of, before the very eyes, visibly, openly, evidently. {@--2@} In person, actually, in bodily form; साक्षात् प्रियामुपगतामपहाय पूर्वं <ls>Ś. 6. 15</ls>; <ls n="Ś.">1. 6.</ls> {@--3@} Directly. In <ab>comp.</ab> it is often translated by ‘incarnate’; साक्षाद्यमः; or by ‘open, direct’; तत्साक्षात्प्रतिषेधः कोपाय <ls>Māl. 1. 11.</ls> ( साक्षात्कृ {1} to see with one's own eyes, realize personally. {2} to have an intuitive perception or manifestation of; साक्षात्कृतधर्माण ॠषयः <ls>U. 7</ls>).
